item.title: Implementing an intuitive versioning and release strategy
item.description: Implementing a versioning and release strategy for a project can be daunting task. An effective strategy should be elegant and require little manual intervention. When forming a strategy the following factors need to be taken under consideration. What kind of artifact(s) does your project produce? Maybe you are writing a library or a full-fledged application comprised of multiple components. How often do you usually release your project?
